properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 10:38AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for the
following rivers in Alabama...
Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.
Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.

.Flooding of Moderate severity is now expected at the Demopolis Lock
and Dam and Gainesville Lock and Dam. Rainfall amounts of 4 to 6
inches upstream are expected through Tuesday, with additional
rainfall expected through the end of the week. All interests along
the Tombigbee need to monitor this flooding situation very closely.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity... The Flood Warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled. * At 10:15 AM Sunday The stage Was 99.9 feet. * Flood stage is 101 feet. * Moderate flooding is forecast. * Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Tuesday afternoon and continue to rise to near 111.9 feet by Friday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. * Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands
